item.title: How to Create a R Package
item.description: 1 Required Package 2 Create the Package 3 Implementation of Package 3.1 Create a Function 3.2 Write the document. 3.3 Add Sample Data 4 Install and Check the Packages 4.1 Check the Document and Data 5 Upload the Package 1 Required Package To make our own R package, we will use devtools and roxygen2 packages. Make sure to install these two packages using install.packages() function.
